thread.title: Coolpad Dazen Note 3 with fingerprint sensor set to launch under Rs 10,000
thread.title_full: Coolpad Dazen Note 3 with fingerprint sensor set to launch under Rs 10,000 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Coolpad Dazen Note 3 with fingerprint sensor set to launch under Rs 10,000
text:
Other Articles Hero MotoCorp reports 33 pct rise in Q1 profit You are in jail by choice: Supreme Court bench to Sahara chief Subrata Roy Can’t bank on Parliament: Unless MPs agree, banks will continue to lose value Coolpad Dazen will soon launch its new smartphone, Dazen Note 3 in India at under Rs 10,000. The Dazen Note 3 features fingerprint scanner at the back with 360 degree finger rotation capability.
The Chinese handset maker, Coolpad had earlier launched its Dazen 1 and Dazen X7 smartphones in India exclusively on Snapdeal . The Dazen Note 3 was recently launched in China and has already received 2.6 million pre-orders in seven days.
The Dazen Note 3 runs Android 5.1 out of the box and will come with a 5.5-inch 720p HD diplay, powered by a Mediatek octa-core MT6753 processor. The device has 2GB RAM coupled with 16GB onboard storage.
Coolpad Dazen Note 3 features a 13MP rear camera and 5MP front-facing camera with CMOS image sensor. (Source: GizmoChina)
“The company might choose to upgrade the handset to 3GB RAM,” said Varun Sharma, India CEO, Coolpad Dazen.
The Coolpad Dazen 3 is a dual-SIM 4G LTE smartphone and will feature a 3000mAh battery. The Coolpad Dazen Note 3 sports a 13MP rear camera with LED flash and a 5MP fron-facing camera with CMOS sensors. Dazen Note 3 will be available in white and black colour.
First Published on August 02, 2015 7:15 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
